Package controller

Class Login

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Login
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class Login
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class handles all functions of the Login Screen including getting the users location, default language, and opens the connection to the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Login()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void aptWithin15()
      This function checks the database in order to see if there is a appointment within 15 minutes
      void errorCheckEn​(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String username)
      This function takes in the user entered password and username then checks them against the database and displays error messages in english
      void errorCheckFr​(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String username)
      This function takes in the user entered password and username if the language is french then using the resourcebundle nat_fr.properties translates the errors into french
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the screen by getting the users location, preferred language, and opening the connection to the database
      void languageUpdaterV2()
      This function collects the users computers default language and changes the labels accordingly using the resourcebundle nat_fr.properties
      void loginButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This function handles the login button.
      static java.lang.String loginCheckPass​(java.lang.String password)
      This function checks the user entered password against the database to validate it.
      static java.lang.String loginCheckUser​(java.lang.String username)
      This function checks the user entered username against the database to validate it.

      • loginButtonPressed

        public void loginButtonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        This function handles the login button. It writes to login_activity.txt in order to keep track of all login attempts It also collects the entered username and password then checks them against the database.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • languageUpdaterV2

        public void languageUpdaterV2()
        This function collects the users computers default language and changes the labels accordingly using the resourcebundle nat_fr.properties

      • errorCheckFr

        public void errorCheckFr​(java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String username)
        This function takes in the user entered password and username if the language is french then using the resourcebundle nat_fr.properties translates the errors into french
        Parameters:
        password - The user entered password
        username - The user entered username

      • errorCheckEn

        public void errorCheckEn​(java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String username)
        This function takes in the user entered password and username then checks them against the database and displays error messages in english
        Parameters:
        password - The user entered password
        username - The user entered username

      • loginCheckUser

        public static java.lang.String loginCheckUser​(java.lang.String username)
        This function checks the user entered username against the database to validate it.
        Parameters:
        username - String username of the user
        Returns:
        un The username that was collected. If null is returned then the user entered username is invalid

      • loginCheckPass

        public static java.lang.String loginCheckPass​(java.lang.String password)
        This function checks the user entered password against the database to validate it.
        Parameters:
        password - password the user entered password
        Returns:
        pw The password that was collected. If null is returned then the user entered passowrd is invalid

      • aptWithin15

        public void aptWithin15()
        This function checks the database in order to see if there is a appointment within 15 minutes
